data.text: @Kaklimax @COVIDnewsfast Yes, here in Saxony the cases are drastically rising now. And what did our ministry do? They waived from today on now most of the mitigations. I have never seen a more useless bunch of politicians in my life that do not heed their oath to protect us.
@BochmannMA @COVIDnewsfast The education ministers in germany suck so hard - feels like a bad movie
@COVIDnewsfast Danish government says it isn't all that bad because they count people who died with corona also as corona deaths.
@COVIDnewsfast @Harvard2H I think I'll have a chicken salad sandwich for lunch.

@COVIDnewsfast That the growth of that pink bar, on the bottom, representing the Omicron BA.2 variant in the United States looks "pretty exponential" to me:

https://t.co/kS1OLjh7n1 https://t.co/UzMkFyI0rF
@COVIDnewsfast and they cancelled the SAB-185 study $SABS - - was our best hope
@COVIDnewsfast Stop the fake test and karuna will vanish pufffff
@COVIDnewsfast Their vaccinated rate is at around 70% and I read that many elderly chose not to. And omicron is crazy fast. So it’s not too surprising. I’m in Japan at 40% positivity rate right now.
@COVIDnewsfast There is nothing strange going on in Denmark. They had a bazillion more people with Covid this winter than during the entire pandemic. It’s not rocket science 🙄 https://t.co/LIEwrR0FX2
